pluggable.name: Export
pluggable.author: Chris Meller
pluggable.description: Exports your Habari blog into the BlogML XML format. Includes: Users, Posts, Tags, Comments, and Options.

help.name: main
help.value:
If you would like to have your export cron'd and automatically emailed to you, check out the ExportEmailer plugin.

If you would like to have your cron'd exports stored perpetually to allow point-in-time snapshot restores, try the ExportSnapshot plugin.
